means: 水汽，水蒸气，无实质之物( vapor的名词复数 )
幻想 [药]吸入剂 [古]忧郁（症）

word_mean: 疑病(症)(hypochondriasis)或癔病性忧郁(hysterical depression)的旧称

sentence.Network_en: His emotions became vague and shifted about like vapors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的心情则如同一团雾气,变幻无常,捉摸不定.

sentence.Network_en: They have hysterics, they weep, they have the vapors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们歇斯底里, 他们哭泣, 他们精神忧郁.

sentence.Network_en: What amazing vapors a lonely man may get into his head!
sentence.Network_cn: 一个寂寞的人脑子里会生成多么令人惊异的幻想 啊 !
